ppl email Manual Page

Name

ppl email - List, show or change email addresses

Synopsis

ppl email
ppl email <contact>
ppl email <contact> <email-address>

Description

With no arguments, the email addresses of each contact in the address book are listed.

If a <contact> is specified, the email address of that contact is shown.

If both a <contact> and an <email-address> are given, then the address is stored as the address of the contact.

Examples

$ ppl email jdoe jdoe@example.org
$ ppl email adam adam@example.com
$ ppl email jdoe
jdoe@example.org
$ ppl email
adam:  adam@example.com
jdoe:  jdoe@example.org
